summary: A leader killed by his own gang, gets offered a chance by Satan himself to escape damnation.
cast: Danny Trejo|Mickey Rourke|Anthony Michael Hall|Dina Meyer|Richard Dillane|Colin Mace|Emil Hostina|Ovidiu Niculescu|Ronan Summers|Edward Akrout|Radu Andrei Micu|James Carroll Jordan|Daniel Lapaine|George Remes|Ioan Cortea|Tomi Cristin|Dan Badarau|Corneliu Ulici|Claudiu Trandafir|Radu Iacoban|Daniel Pisica|Catalina Grama|Miriam Rizea|Constantin Barbulescu|Mike Elliott|Ioan Ionescu|Razvan Oprea|Marius Capota|Ornella Boulé|Sandy Romero
title: Muerte en Tombstone
